revised_title: Quadratic Zeeman Effect and Electric Quadrupole Splitting in a Cubic Doublet System
tldr: The article discusses the theory of magnetic resonance in a cubic doublet system, focusing on the quadratic Zeeman effect and electric quadrupole splitting. The author presents a model calculation for the quadratic Zeeman effect and evaluates the electric quadrupole splitting for integral and half-integral values of the system. The article also explores the enhanced nuclear magnetic hyperfine structure and the behavior of the electron spin resonance and nuclear magnetic resonance spectra.
